name: HAGgle
description:
HAGgle is a roguelike tower defense where you must go into the dungeons to retrieve souls. Use souls to upgrade and purchase towers to challenge the Hag at her own game... but it comes at a price. The Hag’s power grows stronger. Will you be able to defeat the Hag on time? Or will she claim your soul?

Controls:

Top down 2D WASD for movement.

SPACE: Drop and pick up items.

Number Keys (0-9): select items from inventory.

ENTER: Trigger enemy wave or Hag fight.

ESC: View instructions and exit game.

Potential Issues: There are some issues with creatures not finding a path when they should and may cause some walls to be unfairly destroyed.

Notes: This is a functional and finished product. However, we obviously could not add everything we wanted to add in this timeframe. We plan to expand on this concept and fix the bugs in the future.

 

Credits (Game Design and Development): Patato1212 & RoadDust
